title: The Julius L. Chambers Biomedical and Biotechnology Research Institute
sitename: The Julius L. Chambers Biomedical and Biotechnology Research Institute
cleaned_text: Welcome to BBRI JLC-BBRI was named for Julius L. Chambers, who received an undergraduate degree in history from NCCU in 1959 and a law degree from UNC-Chapel Hill in 1962, graduating as editor-in-chief of the school's law review and first in his class.
